nodes.text: Contispex XIX was the last Supreme Chancellor belonging to the Pius Dea faith.
Contispex followed in the Contispex dynasty as Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic and ruled during the civil war between the Faithful and the Renunciates.

When the Pius Dea warships were lured into a trap by their enemies, his flagship Flame of Sinthara was caught by Renunciate battleships and the Chancellor was seized by Jedi on the bridge. He was later taken to Caamas, where he was tried and imprisoned for the rest of his life, without the possibility of communicating with his now dwindling group of followers.
